偟字的基本解释

偟
huáng
闲暇。
恣纵。
古同“遑”。

偟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huáng］
［《廣韻》胡光切，平唐，匣。］
(1)暇；空闲。
(2)通“遑”。急迫。
(3)通“惶”。恐惧；不安。参见“偟偟”、“偟遽”。
(4)见“仿2偟”。

偟字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　偟； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页111第04
【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?胡光切，音黃。仿偟猶佂營。【莊子·大宗師】茫然傍偟乎塵垢之外。　又通遑。【爾雅·釋言】偟，暇也。【揚子·法言】忠臣孝子，偟乎不偟。【註】言忠孝之人，不暇問仙人無益之事也。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋詁】偟，暇也。〕　謹照原書釋詁改釋言。
偟字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
偟字的起名意思

1、暇；空闲； 2、通"遑"。急迫；3、通"惶"。恐惧；不安。

偟
Basic explanation of words
偟
huáng
leisure.
Indulgent.
The ancient same "let alone".
偟
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huáng］
["Guangyun" Hu Guangqie, Ping Tang, Xie. ]
(1) Leisure; free.
(2) Through "to". urgent.
(3) Through "anxiety". Fear; uneasy. See "偟偟", "偟遽".
(4) See "Imitation 2 偟".
偟
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　偟; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 111 04
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Hu Guangqie, yellow tone. Imitation Yan is still a camp. [Zhuangzi·Grand Master] I was at a loss and was surrounded by dust and dirt.　Through again. 【Erya·Explanation】偟, leisure time. [Yangtze·Fayan] Loyal ministers and filial sons are almost unacceptable. [Note] Those who speak loyal and filial piety do not have the time to ask immortals about unhelpful things. Textual research: [[Erya·Release] 偟, leisure time. 〕　I would like to change the interpretation according to the original book.
